titleStmt.title: A most strange and vvonderfull prophesie vpon this troublesome world calculated by the famous doctor in astrologie, Maister Iohn Cypriano, conferred with the iudgements of Iames Marchecelsus and Sinnior Guinardo, three excellent astronomers v[n]der the emperour of Christendom ; sent out of Germany into Italy, to the Vniuersitie of Padua ... ; whereunto is annexed Tarquatus Vandermers seauen yeres study in the arte of magick, vpon the twelue moneths of the yeare ... ; translated out of Italian by Anth. Hollaway ...
titleStmt.author: Cipriano, Giovanni.
Vandermers, Tarquatus. Seauen yeares studie in the arte of magicke.
Hollaway, Anth.
